mapper.select: /* calendar.selectList */ SELECT DATE , CONTENTS FROM ( SELECT DATE , '독서시간 : ' || SUM(STUDY_MIN) || '분' AS CONTENTS , '1' AS ODR FROM ( SELECT (STRFTIME('%s', END_DATE) - STRFTIME('%s', START_DATE)) / 60 AS STUDY_MIN , STRFTIME('%Y-%m-%d', START_DATE) DATE FROM TB_STUDY ts ) A GROUP BY DATE UNION ALL SELECT DATE , (SELECT SUBJECT FROM TB_TODO WHERE SEQ = A.PARENT_SEQ) CONTENTS , '2' AS ODR FROM TB_TODO_DETAIL A ) WHERE 1=1 AND STRFTIME('%Y-%m', DATE) = #{schYearMonthDate} ORDER BY DATE DESC, ODR ASC
